@@ -0,0 +1,61 @@
+/*
+ * @Author: Fleurxxx 984209872@qq.com
+ * @Date: 2024-03-11 21:23:04
+ * @LastEditors: Fleurxxx 984209872@qq.com
+ * @LastEditTime: 2024-03-12 23:24:51
+ * @FilePath: \moving-platform\src\router\index.ts
+ * @Description: 这是默认设置,请设置`customMade`, 打开koroFileHeader查看配置 进行设置: https://github.com/OBKoro1/koro1FileHeader/wiki/%E9%85%8D%E7%BD%AE
+ */
+import { createRouter, createWebHashHistory, RouteRecordRaw } from 'vue-router'
+
+const routes: Array<RouteRecordRaw> = [
+  { 
+    path: "/", 
+    redirect: "/home" 
+  },
+  {
+    path: "/login",
+    component: () => import("@/views/Login.vue"),
+  },
+  {
+    path: "/home",
+    component: () => import("@/"),
+    children: [
+      {
+        path: "", // 空路径，即默认显示的子路由
+        component: () => import("../views/main/Body.vue"),
+        redirect: "/main/arithmetic",
+        children: [
+          {
+            path: "/main/in",
+            component: () => import("../views/Introduction.vue"),
+          },
+          {
+            path: "/main/arithmetic",
+            component: () => import("../views/Arithmetic.vue"),
+          },
+        ],
+      },
+      {
+        path: "/main/option",
+        component: () => import("../views/Option.vue"),
+      },
+      {
+        path: "/main/answer",
+        component: () => import("../views/Answer.vue"),
+      },
+      {
+        path: "/main/finish",
+        component: () => import("../views/Finish.vue"),
+      },
+    ],
+  },
+  
+]
+
+const router = createRouter({
+  history: createWebHashHistory(process.env.BASE_URL),
+  routes
+})
+
+export default router

@@ -0,0 +1,61 @@
+/*
+ * @Author: Fleurxxx 984209872@qq.com
+ * @Date: 2024-03-11 21:23:04
+ * @LastEditors: Fleurxxx 984209872@qq.com
+ * @LastEditTime: 2024-03-12 23:33:03
+ * @FilePath: \moving-platform\src\router\index.ts
+ * @Description: 这是默认设置,请设置`customMade`, 打开koroFileHeader查看配置 进行设置: https://github.com/OBKoro1/koro1FileHeader/wiki/%E9%85%8D%E7%BD%AE
+ */
+import { createRouter, createWebHashHistory, RouteRecordRaw } from 'vue-router'
+
+const routes: Array<RouteRecordRaw> = [
+  { 
+    path: "/", 
+    redirect: "/home" 
+  },
+  {
+    path: "/login",
+    component: () => import("@/views/Login.vue"),
+  },
+  {
+    path: "/home",
+    component: () => import("@/views/Index.vue"),
+    children: [
+      {
+        path: "", // 空路径，即默认显示的子路由
+        component: () => import("@/views/Home.vue"),
+        // redirect: "/main/arithmetic",
+        // children: [
+        //   {
+        //     path: "/main/in",
+        //     component: () => import("../views/Introduction.vue"),
+        //   },
+        //   {
+        //     path: "/main/arithmetic",
+        //     component: () => import("../views/Arithmetic.vue"),
+        //   },
+        // ],
+      },
+      // {
+      //   path: "/main/option",
+      //   component: () => import("../views/Option.vue"),
+      // },
+      // {
+      //   path: "/main/answer",
+      //   component: () => import("../views/Answer.vue"),
+      // },
+      // {
+      //   path: "/main/finish",
+      //   component: () => import("../views/Finish.vue"),
+      // },
+    ],
+  },
+  
+]
+
+const router = createRouter({
+  history: createWebHashHistory(process.env.BASE_URL),
+  routes
+})
+
+export default router

+/*
+ * @Author: Fleurxxx 984209872@qq.com
+ * @Date: 2024-03-11 21:23:04
+ * @LastEditors: Fleurxxx 984209872@qq.com
+ * @LastEditTime: 2024-03-14 19:44:20
+ * @FilePath: \moving-platform\src\router\index.ts
+ * @Description: 这是默认设置,请设置`customMade`, 打开koroFileHeader查看配置 进行设置: https://github.com/OBKoro1/koro1FileHeader/wiki/%E9%85%8D%E7%BD%AE
+ */
+import { createRouter, createWebHashHistory, RouteRecordRaw } from 'vue-router'
+
+const routes: Array<RouteRecordRaw> = [
+  {
+    path: "/login",
+    component: () => import("@/views/Login.vue"),
+  },
+  {
+    path: "/",
+    component: () => import("@/views/Index.vue"),
+    redirect: "/home",
+    children: [
+      {
+        path: "/home", // 空路径，即默认显示的子路由
+        component: () => import("@/views/Home.vue"),
+        // redirect: "/main/arithmetic",
+        // children: [
+        //   {

+        path: "/",

+      // },
+      // {
+      //   path: "/main/finish",
+      //   component: () => import("../views/Finish.vue"),
+      // },
+    ],
+  },
+  
+]
+
+const router = createRouter({
+  history: createWebHashHistory(process.env.BASE_URL),
+  routes
+})
+
+export default router

+/*
+ * @Author: Fleurxxx 984209872@qq.com
+ * @Date: 2024-03-11 21:23:04
+ * @LastEditors: Fleurxxx 984209872@qq.com
+ * @LastEditTime: 2024-03-15 21:15:25
+ * @FilePath: \moving-platform\src\router\index.ts
+ * @Description: 这是默认设置,请设置`customMade`, 打开koroFileHeader查看配置 进行设置: https://github.com/OBKoro1/koro1FileHeader/wiki/%E9%85%8D%E7%BD%AE
+ */
+/*
+ * @Author: Fleurxxx 984209872@qq.com
+ * @Date: 2024-03-11 21:23:04
+ * @LastEditors: Fleurxxx 984209872@qq.com
+ * @LastEditTime: 2024-03-15 20:58:37
+ * @FilePath: \moving-platform\src\router\index.ts
+ * @Description: 这是默认设置,请设置`customMade`, 打开koroFileHeader查看配置 进行设置: https://github.com/OBKoro1/koro1FileHeader/wiki/%E9%85%8D%E7%BD%AE
+ */
+import { createRouter, createWebHashHistory, RouteRecordRaw } from 'vue-router'
+
+const routes: Array<RouteRecordRaw> = [
+  {
+    path: "/login",
+    component: () => import("@/views/Login.vue"),
+  },
+  {
+    path: "/",
+    component: () => import("@/views/Index.vue"),
+    redirect: "/home",
+    children: [
+      {
+        path: "/home", // 空路径，即默认显示的子路由
+        component: () => import("@/views/Home.vue"),
+        // redirect: "/main/arithmetic",
+        // children: [
+        //   {
+        //     path: "/main/in",
+        //     component: () => import("../views/Introduction.vue"),
+        //   },
+        //   {
+        //     path: "/main/arithmetic",
+        //     component: () => import("../views/Arithmetic.vue"),
+        //   },
+        // ],
+      },
+      {
+        path: "/schedule",
+        component: () => import("@/views/Schedule.vue"),
+      },
+      {
+        path: "/activity",
+        component: () => import("@/views/Activity.vue"),
+      },
+      {
+        path: "/integral",
+        component: () => import("@/views/Integral.vue"),
+      },
+      {
+        path: "/person",
+        component: () => import("@/views/Person.vue"),
+      },
+    ],
+  },
+  
+]
+
+const router = createRouter({
+  history: createWebHashHistory(process.env.BASE_URL),
+  routes
+})
+
+export default router
